name: To the Hell
detailed_description:
This is a nerve-racking, stimulating, exciting, and even crashing horizontal version game. In this personal adventure, you have to use the easiest operation to move on in the hardest level.

About the story line(partial)

Players will play the role of a girl who heads for the hell. In order to reach the hell, she needs to go through a hard trial.
The way to the hell is full of hardships, which makes death a very common thing. And in the last you may feel numb about death, but you just have to keep moving on.

About the graphics

Abstract broken graphics, faded black and white background. Bloody red and magical deep blue are all the colors that are left. But what is truly absurd may be this journey, instead of the painting style.

About the level

As an “ordinary” person, you have to act in the fixed rule of physics in the level of the real world. You have to struggle to survive the slightly bloody and malevolent level. Pave the road with blood, and sacrifice your life in exchange for advancement.
The real world is not the only place that is full of hardships. There may exists virtual zone specially designed for the player,in which the rule of physics is no longer working, which makes it even possible for you to make two-segment jump and change gravity. The only thing that matters is to advance.

About operation

The buttons of left, down, right and space are all that you need during the whole game.
